course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Exploring Northeast Asia’ Invisible Giants – Japan and South Korea
course.description: Despite their high rankings in the world’s economy and obvious advantages including deep reservoirs of domestic savings, sophisticated middle-class consumers and proven record in high-tech, Japan and South Korea are eclipsed by the rapid growth of China, India and even ASEAN over the past two decades. The course will look at both these major regional economies from a macroeconomic and historical perspective, and also from the perspective of global investors in financial and non-financial assets. Graded P or F.
